sogou-gaokao.n: 争吵; 争论; 辩论[出现3次)]
sogou-gaokao.cn: 理由; 论据; 论点[出现2次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 争吵; 争论; 辩论[出现15次)]

1.en: As captain of the Anna Sims, moored in Darien, Georgia, he got into a violent argument with a member of his crew.
1.cn: 奥吉弗当时是安娜瑟姆斯号的船长，停泊在佐治亚州达里恩港时，他和一名船员发生了激烈冲突。

2.en: My wife and I had gotten in an argument and my 19-year-old daughter announced that she was leaving the house to move in with her boyfriend.
2.cn: 我的妻子和我吵了一架，我19岁的女儿宣布她要离开家和她的男朋友住在一起。

3.en: In most societies, FGM is considered a cultural tradition, which is often used as an argument for its continuation.
3.cn: 在大多数社会里，女性生殖器切割被看作一种文化传统。这经常作为支持这种行为继续下去的理由。

0.en: Oh, you don't want to call her sexist? The argument doesn't hold.
0.cn: 你不想说她性别歧视吗？这论点站不住脚。

1.en: Your argument precludes the ability of a no-win scenario? I don't believe in no-win scenarios.
1.cn: 你的论点完全排除了无法战胜的这种可能性。我不相信还有不能赢的比赛。

3.en: I like dirt and rocks and facts. No argument here.
3.cn: 我更喜欢脚踏实地货真价实。这我也同意。

4.en: I tried, but he made a fairly well-reasoned argument.
4.cn: 我试了，不过他说的理由太充分了。

5.en: So, for tonight, you can say that you won this argument.
5.cn: 所以今晚你可以宣布你说服了我。

6.en: Can I make an argument here, Mom? Yeah, sure. What's up?
6.cn: 我能说件事吗，妈妈？可以，怎么了？

7.en: When I listened to your argument, I also heard something else.
7.cn: 听你辩护时，我还注意到别的。

8.en: I won't bother to explain, since every village argument is the same.
8.cn: 我就不解释了，反正所有村子里的争论都一样。

9.en: Bite me, Douglas. Right. That's the way you usually attack any argument.
9.cn: 你咬我啊，道格拉斯。没错你对每个反对言论都是那么攻击的。

10.en: I want to live outside. No, Senor, we're not having that argument anymore.
10.cn: 我想住在外面。不行，先生，我们不要再争这个事了。

11.en: Yes, I do. I very much do, Your Honor. It is an argument about many things.
11.cn: 是的，我有，是有的，法官阁下，这是一份协议，关乎很多事项。

12.en: I see I'm not needed to lend you strength. You're fully in command of the argument.
12.cn: 看来我不需要助你一臂之力，你完全能控制得住局势。

13.en: I don't wish to be impertinent, Ms. Walters. But it is an argument worth rehearsing.
13.cn: 无意冒犯，沃尔特斯女士，这样的争吵你以后还会碰到。

14.en: Then throw a couple its wings supporting evidence by argument steps personal stories.
14.cn: 接下来，抛出一些证据或是个人经历。

15.en: You will listen to your family. No more music. Just listen to me play. End of argument.
15.cn: 你要听家里人的话，不许再有音乐了。听我弹一首吧。讨论结束了。

16.en: Friendship Island has expanded. Glad they finally opened that friendly argument section.
16.cn: 友谊岛扩建了，真开心他们开放了和平争论区。

17.en: I have no problem being forceful. But this sexism thing, and the whole school argument, I…
17.cn: 我不介意当打手，但这个性别歧视，还有择校的问题……

18.en: Whatever argument he was having with Ford, it doesn't seem like he was done making his point.
18.cn: 不管当年他和福特之间有什么分歧，他似乎并没有停止表明自己的观点。

19.en: Um, when I finally hear what this argument is about, and I fix it all up in like one second, Ok?
19.cn: 等我真正听清楚这次争吵是所为何事，我会迅速解决好这一问题的，行吗？
